txt.en: Collect sea-hawk feathers from nests or birds ([placeholder]/14)

Luthana's patrons in Umbar BaharbÃªl use sea-hawk feathers when creating some jewellery. She asked that you do your best to collect moulted feathered from their nests and from live creatures if you must.

'Go north and do your best to find the pristine feathers in sea-hawk nests. If you must, kill the birds and collect the pristine feathers. When you collect enough to meet the quota return them to me here at the expedition encampment.'
Collected sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)
Deliver the sea-hawk feathers to Luthana at the hunter's expedition
Collect sea-hawk feathers from nests or birds ([placeholder]/14)

'Go north and do your best to find the pristine feathers in sea-hawk nests. If you must, kill the birds and collect the pristine feathers. When you collect enough to meet the quota return them to me here at the expedition encampment.'
You collected enough feathers for Luthana. Return to the hunter's expedition in the south of the Cape of Umbar and deliver the feathers to her.
Collected sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)
Collect sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)

'These shall do nicely. There are some jewellers who adorn their earrings, necklaces, and other jewellery with feathers. They pay a fair price for the trouble we incur to gather the feathers. I thank you for taking care to harm as few sea-hawks as you could.'
Collected sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)
Deliver the sea-hawk feathers to Luthana at the hunter's expedition
Luthana directed you to the north in search of sea-hawk feathers. Jewellers in Umbar City use them as adornments for many of their creations and pay those who collect them in the wild.
Collected sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)

'I prefer if you can acquire feathers without killing the sea-hawks. There should be feathers that the birds lose in the process of moulting. If you do not find enough in the nests, you may have to kill the birds to meet our quota.\n\n'Find the birds in the hills north of Umbar proper and far north from this encampment. I need fourteen pristine feathers returned to me.'
Deliver the sea-hawk feathers to Luthana at the expedition camp
Collect sea-hawk feathers ([placeholder]/14)

'These shall do nicely. There are some jewellers who adorn their earrings, necklaces, and other jewellery with feathers. They pay a fair price for the trouble we incur to gather the feathers. I thank you for taking care to harm as few sea-hawks as you could.'
Adornment with Feathers
Head north and search sea-hawk nests for feathers. If you find none, kill the sea-hawks for pristine feathers and return them to Luthana at the expedition encampment.
